accounts.mnemonic: test test test test test test test test test test test junk

clean._description: Clears the cache and deletes all artifacts

quiet.name: quiet
quiet.description: Makes the compilation process less verbose

concurrency.name: concurrency
concurrency.description: Number of compilation jobs executed in parallel. Defaults to the number of CPU cores - 1

compile._description: Compiles the entire project, building all artifacts

noCompile.name: noCompile
noCompile.description: Don't compile before running this task

flatten:get-flattened-sources-and-metada._description: Returns all contracts and their dependencies flattened. Also return metadata about pragma directives and SPDX licenses

flatten:get-flattened-sources._description: Returns all contracts and their dependencies flattened

flatten._description: Flattens and prints contracts and their dependencies. If no file is passed, all the contracts in the project will be flattened.

positionalParamDefinitions.name: scopeOrTask
positionalParamDefinitions.description: An optional scope or task to print more info about

positionalParamDefinitions.name: task
positionalParamDefinitions.description: An optional task to print more info about

hostname.name: hostname
hostname.description: The host to which to bind to for new connections (Defaults to 127.0.0.1 running locally, and 0.0.0.0 in Docker)

port.name: port
port.description: The port on which to listen for new connections

fork.name: fork
fork.description: The URL of the JSON-RPC server to fork from

forkBlockNumber.name: forkBlockNumber
forkBlockNumber.description: The block number to fork from

node._description: Starts a JSON-RPC server on top of Hardhat Network

noCompile.name: noCompile
noCompile.description: Don't compile before running this task

positionalParamDefinitions.name: script
positionalParamDefinitions.description: A js file to be run within hardhat's environment

run._description: Runs a user-defined script after compiling the project

positionalParamDefinitions.name: testFiles
positionalParamDefinitions.description: An optional list of files to test

bail.name: bail
bail.description: Stop running tests after the first test failure

grep.name: grep
grep.description: Only run tests matching the given string or regexp

positionalParamDefinitions.name: testFiles
positionalParamDefinitions.description: An optional list of files to test

noCompile.name: noCompile
noCompile.description: Don't compile before running this task

bail.name: bail
bail.description: Stop running tests after the first test failure

grep.name: grep
grep.description: Only run tests matching the given string or regexp

positionalParamDefinitions.name: testFiles
positionalParamDefinitions.description: An optional list of files to test

positionalParamDefinitions.name: value
positionalParamDefinitions.description: The value to store. Omit to be prompted for it.

set._description: Set the value of a configuration variable

get._description: Get the value of a configuration variable

path._description: Show the path of the file where all the configuration variables are stored

setup._description: Show how to setup the configuration variables used by this project
